title: Ta'ameya (Egyptian falafel)
ingredients: ['300g split dried fava beans', '1 red onion, quartered', '30g fresh parsley', '25g fresh corander', '15g fresh dill', '3 cloves garlic', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '145g sesame seeds (optional)', 'vegetable oil for frying']
